# removalAllowed

**Type Property**

A status item that allows interactive removal.

## Declaration

```swift
static var removalAllowed: NSStatusItem.Behavior { get }
```

## Discussion

Status items with this behavior allow interactive removal from the menu bar. Upon removal, the item’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStatusItem/isVisible] property changes to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. This change is observable using key-value observation.

## Behaviors

- **terminationOnRemoval**: A status item that quits the application upon removal.
